alert.note: Alert for Newaygo; Oceana (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 3:42AM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Newaygo and Oceana Counties through 445 AM EDT... At 342 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Silver Lake State Park, or 7 miles southwest of Hart, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hart... White Cloud... Shelby... Fremont... Hesperia... Pentwater... Mears SP... Silver Lake SP... Weare... Elbridge... Colfax... New Era... Rothbury... Walkerville... Brohman... Woodland Park... Hawkins... Woodville... St. Huberts... Stony Lake... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
